tr.td: Ambulance 99203 Office/outpatient Visit New, Community Health Hospitals, 3525, Newberry Avenue , Beaverton, OR, 97006, Tel: 5555551003^

code.displayName: Ambulance 99203 Office/outpatient Visit New, Community Health Hospitals, 3525, Newberry Avenue , Beaverton, OR, 97006, Tel: 5555551003^

tr.td: HealthCare Concerns refer to underlying clinical facts: i. Documented HyperTension problem ii. Documented HypoThyroidism problem iii. Watch Weight of patient
Get rid of intermittent fever that is occurring every few weeks.
Need to gain more energy to do regular activities

The patient was found to have fever and Dr Davis is suspecting Anemia based on the patient history. So Dr Davis asked the patient to closely monitor the temperature and blood pressure and get admitted to Community Health Hospitals if the fever does not subside within a day.
Ms Alice Newman is being referred to Community Health Hospitals Inpatient facility because of the high fever noticed and suspected Anemia.
